name: volume
description: Counter Manager table for exporting volume performance counters. The alias names for volume:node and volume:svm are volume_node and volume_svm respectively.

counter_schemas.name: average_latency
counter_schemas.description: Average latency in microseconds for the WAFL filesystem to process all the operations on the volume; not including request processing or network communication time

counter_schemas.name: bytes_read
counter_schemas.description: Bytes read per second

counter_schemas.name: bytes_written
counter_schemas.description: Bytes written per second

counter_schemas.name: cifs.other_latency
counter_schemas.description: Average time for the WAFL filesystem to process other CIFS operations to the volume; not including CIFS protocol request processing or network communication time which will also be included in client observed CIFS request latency

counter_schemas.name: cifs.other_ops
counter_schemas.description: Number of other CIFS operations per second to the volume

counter_schemas.name: cifs.read_data
counter_schemas.description: Bytes read per second via CIFS

counter_schemas.name: cifs.read_latency
counter_schemas.description: Average time for the WAFL filesystem to process CIFS read requests to the volume; not including CIFS protocol request processing or network communication time which will also be included in client observed CIFS request latency

counter_schemas.name: cifs.read_ops
counter_schemas.description: Number of CIFS read operations per second from the volume

counter_schemas.name: cifs.write_data
counter_schemas.description: Bytes written per second via CIFS

counter_schemas.name: cifs.write_latency
counter_schemas.description: Average time for the WAFL filesystem to process CIFS write requests to the volume; not including CIFS protocol request processing or network communication time which will also be included in client observed CIFS request latency

counter_schemas.name: cifs.write_ops
counter_schemas.description: Number of CIFS write operations per second to the volume

counter_schemas.name: fcp.other_latency
counter_schemas.description: Average time for the WAFL filesystem to process other FCP protocol operations to the volume; not including FCP protocol request processing or network communication time which will also be included in client observed FCP protocol request latency

counter_schemas.name: fcp.other_ops
counter_schemas.description: Number of other block protocol operations per second to the volume

counter_schemas.name: fcp.read_data
counter_schemas.description: Bytes read per second via block protocol

counter_schemas.name: fcp.read_latency
counter_schemas.description: Average time for the WAFL filesystem to process FCP protocol read operations to the volume; not including FCP protocol request processing or network communication time which will also be included in client observed FCP protocol request latency

counter_schemas.name: fcp.read_ops
counter_schemas.description: Number of block protocol read operations per second from the volume

counter_schemas.name: fcp.write_data
counter_schemas.description: Bytes written per second via block protocol

counter_schemas.name: fcp.write_latency
counter_schemas.description: Average time for the WAFL filesystem to process FCP protocol write operations to the volume; not including FCP protocol request processing or network communication time which will also be included in client observed FCP protocol request latency

counter_schemas.name: fcp.write_ops
counter_schemas.description: Number of block protocol write operations per second to the volume

counter_schemas.name: iscsi.other_latency
counter_schemas.description: Average time for the WAFL filesystem to process other iSCSI protocol operations to the volume; not including iSCSI protocol request processing or network communication time which will also be included in client observed iSCSI protocol request latency

counter_schemas.name: iscsi.other_ops
counter_schemas.description: Number of other block protocol operations per second to the volume

counter_schemas.name: iscsi.read_data
counter_schemas.description: Bytes read per second via block protocol

counter_schemas.name: iscsi.read_latency
counter_schemas.description: Average time for the WAFL filesystem to process iSCSI protocol read operations to the volume; not including iSCSI protocol request processing or network communication time which will also be included in client observed iSCSI protocol request latency

counter_schemas.name: iscsi.read_ops
counter_schemas.description: Number of block protocol read operations per second from the volume

counter_schemas.name: iscsi.write_data
counter_schemas.description: Bytes written per second via block protocol

counter_schemas.name: iscsi.write_latency
counter_schemas.description: Average time for the WAFL filesystem to process iSCSI protocol write operations to the volume; not including iSCSI protocol request processing or network communication time which will also be included in client observed iSCSI request latency

counter_schemas.name: iscsi.write_ops
counter_schemas.description: Number of block protocol write operations per second to the volume

counter_schemas.name: name
counter_schemas.description: This is the name of the volume counter row

counter_schemas.name: nfs.access_latency
counter_schemas.description: Average time for the WAFL filesystem to process NFS protocol access requests to the volume; not including NFS protocol request processing or network communication time which will also be included in client observed NFS request latency.

counter_schemas.name: nfs.access_latency_histogram
counter_schemas.description: Latency histograms for access requests from the NFS protocol to the volume in the WAFL filesystem.

counter_schemas.name: nfs.access_ops
counter_schemas.description: Number of NFS accesses per second to the volume.

counter_schemas.name: nfs.getattr_latency
counter_schemas.description: Average time for the WAFL filesystem to process NFS protocol getattr requests to the volume; not including NFS protocol request processing or network communication time which will also be included in client observed NFS request latency.

counter_schemas.name: nfs.getattr_latency_histogram
counter_schemas.description: Latency histograms for getattr requests from the NFS protocol to the volume in the WAFL filesystem.

counter_schemas.name: nfs.getattr_ops
counter_schemas.description: Number of NFS getattr per second to the volume.

counter_schemas.name: nfs.lookup_latency
counter_schemas.description: Average time for the WAFL filesystem to process NFS protocol lookup requests to the volume; not including NFS protocol request processing or network communication time which will also be included in client observed NFS request latency.

counter_schemas.name: nfs.lookup_latency_histogram
counter_schemas.description: Latency histograms for lookup requests from the NFS protocol to the volume in the WAFL filesystem.

counter_schemas.name: nfs.lookup_ops
counter_schemas.description: Number of NFS lookups per second to the volume.

counter_schemas.name: nfs.misaligned_writes_histogram
counter_schemas.description: Mis-aligned writes for specific sized write requests from NFS to the volume in the WAFL filesystem. The mis-alignment is reported only for sizes which are a power of 2.

counter_schemas.name: nfs.other_latency
counter_schemas.description: Average time for the WAFL filesystem to process other NFS operations to the volume; not including NFS protocol request processing or network communication time which will also be included in client observed NFS request latency

counter_schemas.name: nfs.other_latency_histogram
counter_schemas.description: Latency histograms for other requests from the NFS protocol to the volume in the WAFL filesystem.

counter_schemas.name: nfs.other_ops
counter_schemas.description: Number of other NFS operations per second to the volume

counter_schemas.name: nfs.punch_hole_data
counter_schemas.description: Bytes hole-punched per second via NFS to the volume.

counter_schemas.name: nfs.punch_hole_histogram
counter_schemas.description: Granularity histogram for hole-punch requests from NFS to the volume in the WAFL filesystem.

counter_schemas.name: nfs.punch_hole_latency
counter_schemas.description: Average time for the WAFL filesystem to process NFS protocol hole-punch requests to the volume.

counter_schemas.name: nfs.punch_hole_latency_histogram
counter_schemas.description: Latency histograms for hole-punch requests from the NFS protocol to the volume in the WAFL filesystem.

counter_schemas.name: nfs.punch_hole_ops
counter_schemas.description: Number of NFS hole-punch requests per second to the volume.

counter_schemas.name: nfs.read_data
counter_schemas.description: Bytes read per second via NFS

counter_schemas.name: nfs.read_latency
counter_schemas.description: Average time for the WAFL filesystem to process NFS protocol read requests to the volume; not including NFS protocol request processing or network communication time which will also be included in client observed NFS request latency

counter_schemas.name: nfs.read_latency_histogram
counter_schemas.description: Latency histograms for read requests from the NFS protocol to the volume in the WAFL filesystem.

counter_schemas.name: nfs.read_ops
counter_schemas.description: Number of NFS read operations per second from the volume

counter_schemas.name: nfs.setattr_latency
counter_schemas.description: Average time for the WAFL filesystem to process NFS protocol setattr requests to the volume.

counter_schemas.name: nfs.setattr_latency_histogram
counter_schemas.description: Latency histograms for setattr requests from the NFS protocol to the volume in the WAFL filesystem.

counter_schemas.name: nfs.setattr_ops
counter_schemas.description: Number of NFS setattr requests per second to the volume.

counter_schemas.name: nfs.total_ops
counter_schemas.description: Number of total NFS operations per second to the volume.

counter_schemas.name: nfs.write_data
counter_schemas.description: Bytes written per second via NFS

counter_schemas.name: nfs.write_histogram
counter_schemas.description: Write granularity histogram for write requests from NFS to the volume in the WAFL filesystem.

counter_schemas.name: nfs.write_latency
counter_schemas.description: Average time for the WAFL filesystem to process NFS protocol write requests to the volume; not including NFS protocol request processing or network communication time, which will also be included in client observed NFS request latency

counter_schemas.name: nfs.write_latency_histogram
counter_schemas.description: Latency histograms for write requests from the NFS protocol to the volume in the WAFL filesystem.

counter_schemas.name: nfs.write_ops
counter_schemas.description: Number of NFS write operations per second to the volume

counter_schemas.name: node.name
counter_schemas.description: Name of the Node

counter_schemas.name: node.uuid
counter_schemas.description: UUID for the node

counter_schemas.name: other_latency
counter_schemas.description: Average latency in microseconds for the WAFL filesystem to process other operations to the volume; not including request processing or network communication time

counter_schemas.name: parent_aggregate
counter_schemas.description: The name of the aggregate hosting this volume

counter_schemas.name: read_latency
counter_schemas.description: Average latency in microseconds for the WAFL filesystem to process read request to the volume; not including request processing or network communication time

counter_schemas.name: svm.name
counter_schemas.description: Name of the Copy Manager SVM row

counter_schemas.name: svm.uuid
counter_schemas.description: UUID for the Copy Manager SVM row

counter_schemas.name: total_ops
counter_schemas.description: Number of operations per second serviced by the volume

counter_schemas.name: total_other_ops
counter_schemas.description: Number of other operations per second to the volume

counter_schemas.name: total_read_ops
counter_schemas.description: Number of read operations per second from the volume

counter_schemas.name: total_write_ops
counter_schemas.description: Number of write operations per second to the volume

counter_schemas.name: uuid
counter_schemas.description: DSID/MSID of this volume row

counter_schemas.name: write_latency
counter_schemas.description: Average latency in microseconds for the WAFL filesystem to process write request to the volume; not including request processing or network communication time
